name: Super Fancy Pants Adventure
description: Super Fancy Pants Adventure is a wild free-running adventure with buttery smooth platforming and a slick fountain pen!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: 2.5GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: 2.2GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
